meanings.definition: To impart knowledge or skill to someone through instruction.
meanings.sent1: My mom teaches me how to bake cookies.
meanings.sent2: The teacher teaches math to the students every day.
meanings.sent3: The dog teaches the cat how to play fetch.
meanings.sent4: Experience teaches us valuable lessons in life.
meanings.sent5: Practice teaches us to improve our skills over time.

meanings.definition: To give lessons in a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The professor teaches history at the university.
meanings.sent2: She teaches Spanish to beginners at the language school.
meanings.sent3: The parrot teaches the other birds how to sing a new tune.
meanings.sent4: Nature teaches us about the beauty of the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: Music teaches us to appreciate different melodies and rhythms.

meanings.definition: To act as a teacher or instructor.
meanings.sent1: My aunt teaches at the local school.
meanings.sent2: He teaches karate classes at the community center.
meanings.sent3: The wise owl teaches the young owlets how to hunt for food.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse teaches sailors to navigate safely through the night.
meanings.sent5: The mentor teaches the mentee valuable skills for their career.
